title: etherverse
author: etherverse
content: Etherverse is a decentralized and open source cryptocurrency designed specifically for the geek world community and miners. From focus to focus, is the idea of ​​the project, so at first we will focus on anime, manga, manhuas, comics, webcomics and independent games, in the future we will be able to expand to other focuses of the geek world, in addition we will pay special attention to those who maintain the secure and operational network, the miners. Another point is that we are extremely friendly with miners whether by video cards, fpgas or asic's. Therefore, we intend to maintain an income of blocks for those who contribute to the network.Name: EtherverseSymbol: ETVAlgorithm: EthashBase: ERC-20Max Supply: 210 millionDistribution Consensus: Proof of Useful WorkMining Hardware: GPU + ASIC'sDifficulty Adjustment: Every BlockBlock Time: 13 seconds on averageBlock Reward: 20 ETVBlock RewardDistribution:70% Miners30% Development Fund (Defray expenses to maintain the network, programmers, supporters and make donations)Prime: Maybehttps://etherversecoin.wixsite.com/etherverse

comments.author: etherverse
comments.body: In progress, we are creating and developing in our spare time.

comments.author: Sir_Cheer
comments.body: "GPUs + ASICs"Ethash is an asic resistant algorithm and is not PoUW
